about.title: Why Knowia?
about.description1: Knowia is a learning app designed to make learning simpler, more lasting, and sustainable.
about.description2: Knowia is an evolving product. It is shaped by user feedback and aims to offer a stronger, more flexible, and more personalized learning experience over time.
about.description3: With its card-based structure and repetition-focused approach, Knowia breaks knowledge into small, manageable pieces. Users can create decks tailored to their needs or start learning with pre-made decks. They can produce content solely for themselves or enrich their learning by sharing content or using decks shared by other users.
about.description4: Knowia personalizes learning by adapting repetition intervals and learning flow according to each user's preferences. This allows every user to manage their learning process in a way that fits their own schedule, goals, and needs.
about.description5: With its clean interface and smooth interactions, Knowia helps users progress without distractions. Over time, learning stops feeling like a pressured task and becomes a regular, achievable habit.
about.description6: Knowia is a product that continues to evolve. Shaped by user feedback, it aims to provide an increasingly powerful, flexible, and personalized learning experience over time.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.headText: Knowia (Application) respects the privacy of its users and values the protection of personal data. This Privacy Policy explains what information is collected, how it is used, and how it is stored when you use the Knowia mobile application.
privacyPolicy.subHeader1: We may collect the following information:
list1: User-created cards, decks, and uploaded images
Messages sent via feedback forms or email
Technical information such as device type, operating system, and application version
Anonymized technical data and crash logs collected to improve application performance and stability
privacyPolicy.subHeader2: The collected information is used for the following purposes:
list2: To create and manage user accounts
To synchronize learning progress across devices
To provide card and deck creation, editing, and sharing features
To display username and profile photo in shared content
To send account verification, password reset, and informational emails
To send reminders and notifications via push notifications
To improve application performance and user experience
privacyPolicy.subText: Personal data is processed within the scope of performance of the user agreement, provision of application services, user consent, and legitimate interest.
privacyPolicy.subHeader3: Knowia may use third-party services for the operation of the application:
privacyPolicy.subText2: These services process only the necessary data and operate in compliance with applicable data protection regulations.
privacyPolicy.subText3: User data is securely stored in encrypted form through the Supabase infrastructure and, depending on server locations, may be transferred abroad (European Union, United States) in compliance with international data protection standards.
privacyPolicy.subHeader4: Users may share the cards and decks they create with other users.
privacyPolicy.item41: The following information may be visible to other users in shared content:
privacyPolicy.item51: Personal data is retained for as long as necessary to provide the service.
privacyPolicy.item52: Personal data is protected by appropriate technical and administrative security measures against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.
privacyPolicy.item53: Users may permanently delete their account through the “Delete Account” option available in the Profile section of the application.
privacyPolicy.subText4: Once the account deletion request is confirmed by the user, the account and all associated personal data are permanently and irreversibly deleted from the system. Deleted data cannot be restored or reactivated. Records that are required to be retained under applicable legal obligations may be excluded from deletion.
privacyPolicy.subText5: Alternatively, users may request account deletion by contacting our support team via email.
privacyPolicy.item61: Knowia is designed for users aged 13 and above.
privacyPolicy.item62: Personal information is not knowingly collected from children under the age of 13. If a parent or legal guardian becomes aware that personal information of a child under 13 has been collected, please contact us. In such cases, we will take the necessary steps to promptly delete the relevant information.
privacyPolicy.item71: Knowia is currently free of charge.
privacyPolicy.subText6: Optional premium features or advertisements may be offered in the future. Such changes will be updated in this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.subHeader5: Depending on your country of residence, you may have the following rights:
privacyPolicy.item82: Request correction or deletion of your data
privacyPolicy.item83: Withdraw your consent regarding the processing of your data
privacyPolicy.subText7: You have the right to learn whether your personal data is being processed, to request information if it has been processed, and to request correction of incomplete or incorrectly processed data. To exercise these rights, you may contact us via our contact email address.
privacyPolicy.item91: Knowia may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Significant changes may be communicated to users via the application or by email.
privacyPolicy.item101: The data controller of the Knowia application is Knowia (Turkey).
